Translations.Text: Kaya tumhala nirmana karane adhika kathina ahe kinva akasala? Sarvasrestha allahane tyala nirmana kele
Tyaci unci vadhavili, maga tyala yathayogya kele
Ani tyacya ratrila andhakarapurna banavile ani tyacya divasala prakata kele
Ani tyanantara jaminila (samatala) bichavile
Tyatuna pani ani cara kadhala
Ani parvatanna (majabuta) rovale
He sarva tumacya ani tumacya janavarancya phayadyasathi (ahe)
Tara jevha te mothe sankata (kayamata) ye'ila
Jya divasi manusya apalya kelelya karmanci athavana karila
Ani (pratyeka) pahanaryacya samora jahannama ughadapane anali ja'ila
Tevha, jya (manasa) ne vidroha angikarala (asela)
Ani aihika jivanala pradhan'ya dile (asela)
(Tyace) thikana jahannamaca ahe
Tathapi, jo manusya apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe rahanyapasuna bhita rahila asela ani apalya manala iccha-abhilasampasuna rokhale asela
Tara tyace thikana jannataca ahe
Loka tumhala kayamata kevha ghaduna ye'ila ase vicaratata
Te sanganyasi tumaca kaya sambandha
Ticya jnanaci antima sima tara allahakade ahe
Tumhi tara phakta ticyasi bhayabhita rahanaryanna savadhana karanare ahata
Jya divasi he tila (pratyaksa) pahuna ghetila tevha ase vatela ki kevala divasaca antima bhaga athava arambhica bhagaca te (ya jagata) rahileta
